001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api.tools;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.api.CliArgsParser;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.api.CliInput;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.api.CliPrinter;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.api.ExitCode;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.SegmentIoAdapter;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.logging.LoggingConfigurator;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.validation.Numbers;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.validation.Strings;
012import java.io.IOException;
013import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
014import java.nio.file.Files;
015import java.nio.file.Path;
016import java.time.Instant;
017import java.time.ZoneId;
018import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
019import java.util.Map;
020import org.slf4j.Logger;
021import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
022
023/**
024 * CLI utility that scans recorded segment files for a byte sequence and prints matches with context.
025 */
026public final class SegbinGrepCli {
027  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SegbinGrepCli.class);
028  private static final DateTimeFormatter TS =
029      DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("uuuu-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSS").withZone(ZoneId.systemDefault());
030  private static final String SUMMARY_USAGE =
031      "usage: segbingrep needle=STRING [in=./cap-out ctx=32] -- scans segment binaries for a literal byte sequence";
032  private static final String HELP_TEXT = """
033      RADAR segbin grep utility
034
035      Usage:
036        segbingrep needle=STRING [in=./cap-out ctx=32]
037
038      Required options:
039        needle=STRING              Literal byte sequence to search for (ISO-8859-1)
040
041      Common options:
042        in=PATH                    Segment directory to search (must exist)
043        ctx=1-4096                 Context bytes shown around the match (default 32)
044        --help                     Show detailed help
045        --verbose                  Enable DEBUG logging for troubleshooting
046
047      Example:
048        segbingrep needle=login in=./cap-out ctx=16
049      """;
050
051  private SegbinGrepCli() {}
052
053  /**
054   * Entry point invoked by the JVM.
055   *
056   * @param args raw CLI arguments
057   */
058  public static void main(String[] args) {
059    ExitCode exit = run(args);
060    System.exit(exit.code());
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Executes the CLI utility and returns the resulting exit code.
065   *
066   * @param args command-line arguments
067   * @return exit code for the grep operation
068   */
069  public static ExitCode run(String[] args) {
070    CliInput input = CliInput.parse(args);
071    if (input.help()) {
072      CliPrinter.println(HELP_TEXT.stripTrailing());
073      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
074    }
075    if (input.verbose()) {
076      LoggingConfigurator.enableVerboseLogging();
077      log.debug("Verbose logging enabled for segbingrep CLI");
078    }
079
080    Map<String, String> kv;
081    try {
082      kv = CliArgsParser.toMap(input.keyValueArgs());
083    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
084      log.error("Invalid argument: {}", ex.getMessage());
085      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
086      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
087    }
088
089    String needleRaw = kv.get("needle");
090    if (needleRaw == null) {
091      log.error("Missing required argument needle=STRING");
092      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
093      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
094    }
095
096    String needle;
097    try {
098      needle = Strings.requireNonBlank("needle", needleRaw);
099    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
100      log.error("Invalid needle: {}", ex.getMessage());
101      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
102      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
103    }
104
105    String ctxRaw = kv.getOrDefault("ctx", "32");
106    int ctx;
107    try {
108      ctx = Integer.parseInt(ctxRaw.trim());
109      Numbers.requireRange("ctx", ctx, 1, 4_096);
110    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
111      log.error("Invalid ctx value: {}", ex.getMessage());
112      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
113      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
114    }
115
116    Path inputDir = Path.of(kv.getOrDefault("in", "./cap-out"));
117    try {
118      inputDir = ensureReadableDirectory(inputDir);
119    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
120      log.error("Invalid input directory: {}", ex.getMessage());
121      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
122      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
123    }
124
125    byte[] pattern = needle.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);
126    int total = 0;
127    int hits = 0;
128
129    try (SegmentIoAdapter.Reader reader = new SegmentIoAdapter.Reader(inputDir)) {
130      SegmentRecord record;
131      while ((record = reader.next()) != null) {
132        total++;
133        byte[] payload = record.payload();
134        if (payload.length == 0) {
135          continue;
136        }
137        int offset = indexOf(payload, pattern);
138        if (offset >= 0) {
139          hits++;
140          int start = Math.max(0, offset - ctx);
141          int end = Math.min(payload.length, offset + pattern.length + ctx);
142          String left = toAscii(payload, start, offset);
143          String mid = toAscii(payload, offset, offset + pattern.length);
144          String right = toAscii(payload, offset + pattern.length, end);
145          log.info(
146              "{} GREP {}:{} -> {}:{} seq={} len={} off={}",
147              TS.format(toInstant(record.timestampMicros())),
148              record.srcIp(),
149              record.srcPort(),
150              record.dstIp(),
151              record.dstPort(),
152              record.sequence(),
153              payload.length,
154              offset);
155          log.info("        \"{}[{}]{}\"", left, mid, right);
156        }
157      }
158    } catch (IOException ex) {
159      log.error("Failed to scan segments in {} due to I/O error", inputDir, ex);
160      return ExitCode.IO_ERROR;
161    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
162      log.error("Invalid segbingrep configuration: {}", ex.getMessage(), ex);
163      return ExitCode.CONFIG_ERROR;
164    } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
165      Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
166      log.error("Segbin grep interrupted", ex);
167      return ExitCode.INTERRUPTED;
168    } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
169      log.error("Unexpected runtime failure during segbingrep", ex);
170      return ExitCode.RUNTIME_FAILURE;
171    } catch (Exception ex) {
172      log.error("Unexpected checked exception during segbingrep", ex);
173      return ExitCode.RUNTIME_FAILURE;
174    }
175
176    log.info("Scanned %,d segments, matches: %,d", total, hits);
177    return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
178  }
179
180  private static Path ensureReadableDirectory(Path path) {
181    try {
182      Path real = path.toRealPath();
183      if (!Files.isDirectory(real)) {
184        throw new IllegalArgumentException("path is not a directory");
185      }
186      if (!Files.isReadable(real)) {
187        throw new IllegalArgumentException("directory is not readable");
188      }
189      return real;
190    } catch (IOException ex) {
191      throw new IllegalArgumentException("unable to access directory: " + path, ex);
192    }
193  }
194
195  private static int indexOf(byte[] haystack, byte[] needle) {
196    if (needle.length == 0 || haystack.length < needle.length) {
197      return -1;
198    }
199    outer:
200    for (int i = 0; i <= haystack.length - needle.length; i++) {
201      for (int j = 0; j < needle.length; j++) {
202        if (haystack[i + j] != needle[j]) {
203          continue outer;
204        }
205      }
206      return i;
207    }
208    return -1;
209  }
210
211  private static String toAscii(byte[] data, int start, int end) {
212    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(Math.max(0, end - start));
213    for (int i = start; i < end; i++) {
214      int c = data[i] & 0xFF;
215      if (c >= 32 && c < 127) {
216        sb.append((char) c);
217      } else {
218        sb.append('.');
219      }
220    }
221    return sb.toString();
222  }
223
224  private static Instant toInstant(long timestampMicros) {
225    long seconds = Math.floorDiv(timestampMicros, 1_000_000L);
226    long micros = Math.floorMod(timestampMicros, 1_000_000L);
227    return Instant.ofEpochSecond(seconds, micros * 1_000L);
228  }
229}
230
231
